```{r libraries, echo=FALSE}
library(rvest)
library(dplyr)
library(stringr)
library(htmltools)
library(htmlwidgets)
```

## Read text from YCombinator "Ask HW" page

```{r extract}
link = "https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=31582796"
page = read_html(link) %>% 
        html_nodes(".c00") %>%
        html_text()
comment <- str_trim(page)
```


## Extract Company Name

```{r test-extract-company-name}
comment <- c(comment)
name <- str_extract(comment, "^[:graph:]+[:space:][|\\-]|^[:graph:]+[:space:][:graph:]+[:space:][|\\-]|^[:graph:]+[:space:][:graph:]+[:space:][:graph:]+[:space:][|\\-]|^[:graph:]+[:space:][:graph:]+[:space:][:graph:]+[:space:][:graph:]+[:space:][|\\-]|^[:graph:]+[:space:][:graph:]+[:space:][:graph:]+[:space:][:graph:]+[:space:][:graph:]+[:space:][|\\-]")
```

## Clean Name

```{r clean-name}
name_no_NA <- na.omit(name)
name_remove <- str_replace(name_no_NA, "\\s{1}[|\\-]{1}|[|\\-]{1}\\s{1}[:graph:]+[:space:][:graph:]+", "")
name_clean <- str_replace(name_remove, "\\s{1}[|]", "")
```
